items.name: Netos
items.description: Netos bridges Business, IT Networks, and Finance with best-in-class data and analytics to quickly deliver actionable financial insights from within NetBox.

summary.business_use_case: Helps organizations reduce costs, extend asset life, and align IT projects with business objectives by providing accurate financial and operational insights.
summary.integration: Seamless integration with existing network inventory, business and financial data, and external pricing and data feeds. Supports TBM for business categorization and alignment, and API integrations.
summary.release_rate: Quarterly updates to support evolving business and IT requirements.
summary.use_case: Lifecycle (EoX) reporting, capacity planning, financial modeling, forward planning, and project forecasting.
